issue.title: [Packaging][RPM] Add support for CentOS 7 on aarch64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6639](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6639). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
apt:build rake task supports architecture to run [1], but it is not true
 for yum task.

 [1] <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/tasks/linux-packages/package-task.rb#L276>

It is useful yum task also supports architecture (ex. i386) too. (even though CentOS 6 i386 EOL reaches 2020/11)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6639?focusedCommentId=16934142) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We don't build i386 packages. But adding support for aarch64. So it's acceptable to do this to add support for aarch64.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6639?focusedCommentId=16935257) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5448
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5448>
